node1.name: Water Filtration
node1.description: Filter water to meet WHO standards

embodiment.description: Ceramic filters to remove impurities and contaminants from the water.

physics_models.name: Filtration Model
physics_models.python_code:
def calculate_flow_rate(pressure_diff, viscosity=1.0, resistance=1.0):
    return pressure_diff / (viscosity * resistance)

node1.verification_plan: Water quality testing against WHO standards.
